oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mary Spiva Beasley, Secretary to Judge Chester K. Hart, Nashville, Tennessee, 1940 February
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Mary Spiva Beasley, Secy. to Judge Chester K. Hart in Nashville, Tennessee, circa February 1940. Beasley was also an officer of the Women’s Business and Professional Club. Judge Hart presided over Division I, Davidson County Criminal Court. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Beasley, Mary Spiva; Hart, Chester K., 1883-1968
